Uses of Interface
com.beowulfe.hap.HomekitCharacteristicChangeCallback

  • Packages that use HomekitCharacteristicChangeCallback 
    Package Description
    com.beowulfe.hap.accessories
    Contains interfaces that can be implemented to represent an exposed accessory.
    com.beowulfe.hap.characteristics
    Contains the basic characteristic types that can be supplied over the Homekit Accessory Protocol.

    • Uses of HomekitCharacteristicChangeCallback in com.beowulfe.hap.accessories

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DimmableLightbulb.subscribeBrightness(HomekitCharacteristicChangeCallback callback)
      Subscribes to changes in the brightness of the light.
      void Thermostat.subscribeCoolingThresholdTemperature(HomekitCharacteristicChangeCallback callback)
      Subscribes to changes in the cooling threshold.
      void LockMechanism.subscribeCurrentMechanismState(HomekitCharacteristicChangeCallback callback)
      Subscribes to changes in the binary state of the lock.
      void Thermostat.subscribeCurrentMode(HomekitCharacteristicChangeCallback callback)
      Subscribes to changes in the ThermostatMode of the thermostat.
      void Thermostat.subscribeCurrentTemperature(HomekitCharacteristicChangeCallback callback)
      Subscribes to changes in the current temperature.
      void Thermostat.subscribeHeatingThresholdTemperature(HomekitCharacteristicChangeCallback callback)
      Subscribes to changes in the heating threshold.
      void ColorfulLightbulb.subscribeHue(HomekitCharacteristicChangeCallback callback)
      Subscribes to changes in the hue of the light.
      void Lightbulb.subscribeLightbulbPowerState(HomekitCharacteristicChangeCallback callback)
      Subscribes to changes in the binary state of the light.
      void ColorfulLightbulb.subscribeSaturation(HomekitCharacteristicChangeCallback callback)
      Subscribes to changes in the saturation of the light.
      void LockableLockMechanism.subscribeTargetMechanismState(HomekitCharacteristicChangeCallback callback)
      Subscribes to changes in the pending, but not yet completed, binary state.
      void Thermostat.subscribeTargetMode(HomekitCharacteristicChangeCallback callback)
      Subscribes to changes in the pending, but not yet complete, ThermostatMode of the thermostat.
      void Thermostat.subscribeTargetTemperature(HomekitCharacteristicChangeCallback callback)
      Subscribes to changes in the target temperature.
